00013 ULONG mask_bits[]={
00014     0x000000L,0x000001L,0x000003L,0x000007L,0x00000fL,0x00001fL,
00015     0x00003fL,0x00007fL,0x0000ffL,0x0001ffL,0x0003ffL,0x0007ffL,
00016     0x000fffL,0x001fffL,0x003fffL,0x007fffL,0x00ffffL,0x01ffffL,
00017     0x03ffffL,0x07ffffL,0x0fffffL,0x1fffffL,0x3fffffL,0x7fffffL,
00018     0xffffffL

00027 void initbitbuf(UCHAR *in){
00028     bitbuf = 0;
00029     bitcount = 0;
00030     indata = in;
00031     DROPBITS(0);
